name: Rokk
tagline: Together we can develop your future
description:
Since 2002 Rokk has been working with businesses and organisations locally, nationally and internationally, both large and small, to provide technical and creative business-focused solutions.
We pride ourselves on being at the forefront of digital and technological trends, specialising in assisting clients to solve the most complex of business challenges through cost-effective software applications and processes. Our in-house team have an international reputation for delivering cost-effective, insightful and business lead technical and creative solutions to a vast array of sectors and organisations.
Whether mobilising a workforce with an iOS or Android mobile app solution, upgrading a legacy business system to .NET, or developing a complex transactional website with custom PHP, CSS and HTML, we can streamline your business processes, build solutions for additional revenue and even support your start-up.
READ MORE...
